changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES ( ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, FEWS_DATA NVARCHAR(MAX) NOT NULL )

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES', 'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES
